tag_list: mark-fenix, web-site-design, shopping-cart, fenix-advertising, fenix-consultant, online-presence-manager, cleveland-ohio
overview:
Marketing Consultant, Brand Manager from Cleveland, Ohio.

Mark Fenix is a proven brand specialist focusing on concept evolution and brand development, industry trade marketing and consumer promotions. Experienced as a team leader, manager and partner in brand creation and building, strategic planning, designing and implementing promotional campaigns across multiple advertising channels.

Fenix has been described as having a unique ability to focus on the essential details required for establishing an internet presence while building brand awareness and helping partners dominate within their verticals as market leaders.
